job.name: TpcPrompt
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes setup 64b # starver TFG18k staver .DEV2 set file = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} .event.root`; echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log # set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}*.root"` # if ("${f}" == "") then root.exe -x -q -b 'TpcPrompt.C(1000000,"'${INPUTFILE0}'","'${file}'.root")' >& ${logFile} # endif
